game.name: Grim Dawn - Steam Loyalist Items Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Downloadable Content, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Whether you're an old fan or just purchasing Grim Dawn, this fun collection of vanity items allows you to outfit your character with a little extra flourish. The historically themed items can be applied to existing gear to transform the look while retaining the original stats.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Whether you're an old fan or just purchasing Grim Dawn, this fun collection of vanity items allows you to outfit your character with a little extra flourish. The historically themed items can be applied to existing gear to transform the look while retaining the original stats.
